May 1, 1994 D Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (First Section)
Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (First Section) 10 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest yorkshire-humberside-bba-contest-first-section
Riley Smith Hall, Tadcaster, North Yorkshire, England, UK March contest - 1st Langbaurgh, 2nd Hoyland, 3rd Yarm. Hymn tune contest - 1st Hoyland, 2nd Langbaurgh, 3rd Yarm. 36th annual contest. 3 bands competed.
Dec. 13, 2011, 2 p.m. Aug. 27, 2014, 12:53 p.m.
1 Strata Brass John Hopkinson
2 North Skelton Band John Woodward
3 Yarm & District Band Unknown
Withdrawn Tingley Thornhill Graham Hooper
